items.content_html: Noads is a lightweight Chrome extension that removes specific DOM elements using CSS selectors, effectively blocking ads on web pages.

items.content_html: The Notepad App, built with React, offers real-time updates, a clean interface, and persistent local storage, ensuring your notes are saved even after closing the app. Fast, lightweight, and intuitive, it provides a seamless note-taking experience with efficient performance for everyday use.
items.title: Siddhant8000441/notepad: The Notepad App, built with React, offers real-time updates, a clean interface, and persistent local storage, ensuring your notes are saved even after closing the app. Fast, lightweight, and intuitive, it provides a seamless note-taking experience with efficient performance for everyday use.

items.content_html: 七圣召唤 Lite，「原神」同人游戏。相比原版「七圣召唤」，具有轻量化、高自由度等特点。 ／ GITCG Lite is a "Genshin Impact" Doujin game. It is lightweight and highly customizable compared to the original game.
